docs.snippet: A threatened strike of the Long Island Rail Road by its trainmen and an alternative plan by them to work but not collect fares were headed off last night by President Johnson.
docs.lead_paragraph: A threatened strike of the Long Island Rail Road by its trainmen and an alternative plan by them to work but not collect fares were headed off last night by President Johnson.
docs.abstract: Pres Johnson, in Uruguay, invokes Ry Labor Act provisions for 60-day cooling-off period; sets up 3-man emergency bd to probe dispute; union gen chmn Pryor cancels plan under which trainmen would work but not collect fares; Mayor Lindsay concerned over strike threat; confs on emergency plans

headline.main: PRESIDENT BLOCKS STRIKE ON L.I.R.R.; Three-Man Board Is Named to Investigate Dispute

docs.snippet: PUNTA DEL ESTE, Uruguay, April 12--The meeting of American Presidents that began in this seaside resort today is an expression on the highest level thus far of the 150-yearold dream of Pan-Americanism.

docs.snippet: The Museum of Modern Art made known yesterday plans to expand its activities in LatinAmerican countries. The announcement coincided with the opening of the Pan-American economic conference at Punta del Este, Uruguay, and with Pan-American Week, which...
docs.lead_paragraph: The Museum of Modern Art made known yesterday plans to expand its activities in LatinAmerican countries. The announcement coincided with the opening of the Pan-American economic conference at Punta del Este, Uruguay, and with Pan-American Week, which started Sunday.
docs.abstract: Museum of Modern Art vice chmn Paley repts museum will expand program of touring shows through Latin-Amer artists and officials; Mayor Lindsay and wife attend

headline.main: MODERN MUSEUM SALUTES AMIGOS; Plans for Art to Tour Latin America Told at Party

docs.snippet: PUNTA DEL ESTE, Uruguay, April 12--President Johnson told the leaders of Latin America today that he would try to support their new common market with more financial aid, but hedged his promises on other forms of economic help.
docs.lead_paragraph: PUNTA DEL ESTE, Uruguay, April 12--President Johnson told the leaders of Latin America today that he would try to support their new common market with more financial aid, but hedged his promises on other forms of economic help.

docs.snippet: PUNTA DEL ESTE, Uruguay, April 13--The Presidents of the American republics approved unanimously today a declaration of purpose and "action program" designed to achieve the economic integration of the Americas.
